overview: Amos, a Boston beanery owner inherits a restaurant out West and goes out to make his fortune. Unfortunately, the local card sharps take his last dime and show him up for a tenderfoot. So Amos sets out to become a gunslinger.
tagline: The story of a boy who tried to pick a deuce but found a Joker and a Queen instead
title: The Deuce of Spades
